title: Gifting time?
body: My friend recently change region and just added me as a friend, how much time must pass so he can give me a gift?

replies.body: actualy he can gift you after you win or lose a game so instantly :3 (just play games with him)

You have to be friends with them for an entire day (24 hours) according to our [Gifting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ). There are a few other conditions, so I recommend checking that guide out.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
